nhc_headline: ...BERYL APPROACHING THE WINDWARD ISLANDS... ...LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED TO BEGIN WITHIN A FEW HOURS...
summary:
...BERYL APPROACHING THE WINDWARD ISLANDS... ...LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED TO BEGIN WITHIN A FEW HOURS...
 As of 2:00 AM AST Mon Jul 1
 the center of Beryl was located near 11.5, -59.1
 with movement W at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 965 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.
